channel.description: Recent content in Software on Curiosity432 Blog

item.title: The best apps for manage content
item.description: Intro As living beings to obtain information, we make use of data and we store them in our mind, that is to say, we organize the data in our database (the mind) and we mold them internally, that is to say, we shape the interior or in other words, we in-form ourselves to learn and obtain knowledge. When it comes to classifying information we do the same whether in a physical environment with a folio or a digital one with an electronic device.
